text: Andreas Seppi was the defending champion. Seppi defended his title, defeating Matthias Bachinger in the final, 6–4, 6–3. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top Half=== ===Bottom Half=== ==References== * Main Draw * Qualifying Draw Sparkassen ATP Challenger - Singles 2014 Singles
title: 2014 Sparkassen ATP Challenger – Singles
